review: Bought this to replace an Oppo bdp-105 which I felt was overkill and about to be superseded by 4k anyway...Does great with streaming Netflix (though do have to reboot the unit once in a while) and Amazon. Sideloaded Kodi (formerly XBMC) for local stored content on my network, works well for videos but odd/slow audio playback for flac; don't have to have rootable unit to do this.Nice remote, works great. Overall compared to Roku/bluray it's a better choice for me.Unit itself is quite tiny, generates very little heat. I have it hardwired to my network/internet. Did try wireless and seemed fine but I prefer the stability/speed of hardwire.Best $79 you could spend in my opinion. Devices like this are gamechangers!
